name: Limited Edition 11x17 Poster: "Malicious Mondays"
description:
Originally debuted at Art: Institutionalized's booth at SabotenCon 2010, this is a special, limited edition illustration.  Only 50 were ever made, and they will NOT be reprinted!  Each poster is hand-numbered out of 50, and signed by Megan, the artist.  Act fast before they're gone forever!

Purchase this print and you will also receive a FREE bookmark!!

Your poster will be carefully packed and shipped to you in a carboard poster tube, not a flimsy envelope.  And remember, all prices in the Art: Institutionalized store include domestic shipping within the United States.  Fees for international shipping will vary.

**PS - The "limited edition" text in the top-right corner is not present in the actual print! :)

name: Bookmark: Studying is Important!
description:
It's a bookmark!  It's a comic!  It's....both?  If you're stuck in a boring class, burying your nose in a textbook trying desperately to keep your eyes open, mark your page with an Art: Institutionalized bookmark!  Give yourself something to giggle at, and don't get caught sleeping in class!

These bookmarks are full color, and made with thick, glossy cardstock, with a comic on one side and art on the other.


Price includes domestic shipping within the United States.  Item will be shipping in a regular business envelope, but with padding to protect it from harm.  Fees for international shipping will vary.
